title: If Gangnam Style was made by a woman would it be as popular? - Quora

response.answer_text: No.  But then, it probably wouldn't be as popular if it were made by ANYONE else.  Rather than this being a question of gender equality, maybe we should look at the bare reality of it: it's one song, made by one man, under one circumstance. Out of the many possibilities and sliding-door realities there could have been, it only happened once. No one else would have created it.
